blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
James: There are some things I can just smell. It’s like a sixth sense.
Lily: No, actually that would be one of the five.
body:
James: There are some things I can just smell. It’s like a sixth sense.
Lily: No, actually that would be one of the five.

summary:
Rowan: so how did your date with Penny go?
MC: I tried to compliment her by saying “you have a nice smile and beautiful...
body:
Rowan: so how did your date with Penny go?

MC: I tried to compliment her by saying “you have a nice smile and beautiful eyes”

Rowan: aw that’s sweet, what went wrong?

MC: I panicked and just said “you have eyes”

summary: y’all know this story about the cursed vaults in Hogwarts Mystery? I think Bill could find out the chamber of secrets during his...
body:
y’all know this story about the cursed vaults in Hogwarts Mystery? I think Bill could find out the chamber of secrets during his years in Hogwarts.

BECAUSE

hp, book 2, chapter 9

“You know, it rings a sort of bell,” said Ron slowly. “I think someone told me a story about a secret chamber at Hogwarts once… might’ve been Bill…”

LMAO

blog.name: elegantcherryblossomsheep
blog.title: just another perfect life being done totally shitly
blog.description:
Welcome to the chaos
• 
Just a fangirl, but like, I aint no girl.
• 
Obsessed with memes 
• 
Harry potter, carry on, hamilton, six of crows, marvel, and literally any other shit can be found here
•  Aspen  • 
They/Them • 
Fear following me. You have no idea what you’re getting yourself into.
• 
Guess what? I’m totally gay.
• 
Assholes, don't interact.
• 
fun fact: I'm an introverted lil shit.

summary:
'Why do people still like Harry Potter when it came out so long ago?!'
Look... I don't know how to explain this in simpler terms...
body:
‘Why do people still like Harry Potter when it came out so long ago?!’

Look… I don’t know how to explain this in simpler terms but sometimes people just like things and that’s it and it’s none of your business

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary:
Polaroid Camera
Year 1977, Hogwarts
James Potter was an excellent Chaser.
Anyone could see it in the way he effortlessly...
body:
Polaroid Camera

Year 1977, Hogwarts

James Potter was an excellent Chaser.

Anyone could see it in the way he effortlessly manoeuvred his broomstick.

Today though, James was feeling exceptionally nervous.

“It’s the first game I’m playing since Lily and I embarked on this thing of ours,” He told a sleepy and disinterested Sirius Black over breakfast in the Great Hall. “And we’re playing Slytherin.”

“So?” Sirius somehow managed to yawn and shove some toast down his throat at the same time.

“So I’ve got to do WELL,” James said, letting anxiety colour his voice. “Lily will be watching, and she’s sort of my girlfriend now, and —“

“And you’ll do fine,” Sirius tried to adopt a reassuring tone. “You always excel at this flying stuff, I reckon you’ll have Slytherin begging for mercy in five minutes.”

Nevertheless, James Potter was a bundle of nerves throughout breakfast (though he cracked a genuine smile when a certain redhead kissed him on his cheek, wishing him good luck).

As he headed out towards the pitch, he murmured a silent prayer under his breath that he would knock out Slytherin and knock the socks off his girlfriend.

———————————————

Gryffindor was losing. Very badly, one might add.

James couldn’t understand it. The Gryffindor quidditch team was usually a well-oiled machine, working together efficiently. Perhaps it was an off day, perhaps it was because James was fraught with rare nerves, but Slytherin was crushing Gryffindor.

The Gryffindor team was losing its morale fast. Lily Evans could see the light dimming in their eyes, and James especially looked frustrated and worse, dispirited.

Lily couldn’t bear to hold in her own emotions any longer after yet another successful goal by the Slytherin team. She caught sight of the slump in the Gryffindor team’s shoulders and was suddenly alight with a reckless sort of determination.

To the spectators’ astonishment, sensible Lily Evans marched over to Quidditch commentator Mary MacDonald, grabbed the megaphone and shouted hoarsely into the megaphone, “GRYFFINDOR QUIDDITCH TEAM IS THE BEST! KEEP FIGHTING!”

And then, “JAMES POTTER! I’M TELLING YOU AS YOUR GIRLFRIEND THAT DON’T YOU DARE GIVE UP NOW.”

There was a great deal of raucous laughter from the red-clad spectators, and a chorus of boos from the ones in green.

The Gryffindor quidditch team smiled appreciatively at her, while the Slytherins rolled their eyes.

And James Potter had a rather stupid grin on his face.

——————————————

“It was such a pity that we lost, but all of you played so well! It was a really narrow gap, and besides it was only because of the Snitch that they won. Don’t be disappointed, you did great, James,” Lily said soothingly to a rather deflated James, patting him on his back.

James grimaced, but there was no real malice behind it. “I think I need a kiss to make me feel better,” He said, pouting, as he pulled her towards him.

Lily felt her cheeks flush pink. “I don’t think so,” She said.

“Oh, come off it,” James teased. “Just twenty minutes ago, you were bossing me around as my girlfriend, weren’t you?”

Lily suppressed a rather sappy smile and pressed her lips to his. Leaning forward, James wrapped his arms around and begin to deepen the kiss —

“Ahem,” Coughed a familiar voice. The couple broke apart. Sirius and Remus were amused to see two pairs of eyes glaring accusingly at them.

“What do you want, Padfoot,” James said shortly.

“I bought this over the summer,” Sirius said, enthusiastically presenting his friends with a battered Polaroid camera. “Muggles use it, apparently… It produces photographs that aren’t moving!”

“Oh, that’s a camera,” Lily said, taking the gadget from Sirius. “I know how to use one, I’ll take a photograph of you three boys.”

“No, let me,” James said, clearly showing off. “I’ve used a Muggle camera before, I’ll have you know I’m excellent at photography.”

Lily rolled her eyes but it was with a grin on her face that she passed the Muggle camera to James.

“Alright then, get together! Oi, Moony, come in closer! And… One, two, three!”

And so the little photograph of Sirius and Remus, with their arms around Lily, was born.

Based off this artwork by @sydsketch

“Oh, that’s a camera,” Lily said, taking the gadget from Sirius. “I know how to use one, I’ll take a photograph of you three boys.”

“No, let me,” James said, clearly showing off. “I’ve used a Muggle camera before, I’ll have you know I’m excellent at photography.”

Lily rolled her eyes but it was with a grin on her face that she passed the Muggle camera to James.

“Alright then, get together! Oi, Moony, come in closer! And… One, two, three!”

And so the little photograph of Sirius and Remus, with their arms around Lily, was born.

———————————————

Gryffindor was losing. Very badly, one might add.

James couldn’t understand it. The Gryffindor quidditch team was usually a well-oiled machine, working together efficiently. Perhaps it was an off day, perhaps it was because James was fraught with rare nerves, but Slytherin was crushing Gryffindor.

The Gryffindor team was losing its morale fast. Lily Evans could see the light dimming in their eyes, and James especially looked frustrated and worse, dispirited.

Lily couldn’t bear to hold in her own emotions any longer after yet another successful goal by the Slytherin team. She caught sight of the slump in the Gryffindor team’s shoulders and was suddenly alight with a reckless sort of determination.

To the spectators’ astonishment, sensible Lily Evans marched over to Quidditch commentator Mary MacDonald, grabbed the megaphone and shouted hoarsely into the megaphone, “GRYFFINDOR QUIDDITCH TEAM IS THE BEST! KEEP FIGHTING!”

And then, “JAMES POTTER! I’M TELLING YOU AS YOUR GIRLFRIEND THAT DON’T YOU DARE GIVE UP NOW.”

There was a great deal of raucous laughter from the red-clad spectators, and a chorus of boos from the ones in green.

The Gryffindor quidditch team smiled appreciatively at her, while the Slytherins rolled their eyes.

And James Potter had a rather stupid grin on his face.

——————————————

“It was such a pity that we lost, but all of you played so well! It was a really narrow gap, and besides it was only because of the Snitch that they won. Don’t be disappointed, you did great, James,” Lily said soothingly to a rather deflated James, patting him on his back.

James grimaced, but there was no real malice behind it. “I think I need a kiss to make me feel better,” He said, pouting, as he pulled her towards him.

Lily felt her cheeks flush pink. “I don’t think so,” She said.

“Oh, come off it,” James teased. “Just twenty minutes ago, you were bossing me around as my girlfriend, weren’t you?”

Lily suppressed a rather sappy smile and pressed her lips to his. Leaning forward, James wrapped his arms around and begin to deepen the kiss —

“Ahem,” Coughed a familiar voice. The couple broke apart. Sirius and Remus were amused to see two pairs of eyes glaring accusingly at them.

“What do you want, Padfoot,” James said shortly.

“I bought this over the summer,” Sirius said, enthusiastically presenting his friends with a battered Polaroid camera. “Muggles use it, apparently… It produces photographs that aren’t moving!”

“Oh, that’s a camera,” Lily said, taking the gadget from Sirius. “I know how to use one, I’ll take a photograph of you three boys.”

“No, let me,” James said, clearly showing off. “I’ve used a Muggle camera before, I’ll have you know I’m excellent at photography.”

Lily rolled her eyes but it was with a grin on her face that she passed the Muggle camera to James.

“Alright then, get together! Oi, Moony, come in closer! And… One, two, three!”

And so the little photograph of Sirius and Remus, with their arms around Lily, was born.

Based off this artwork by @sydsketch

blog.name: poplitealqueen
blog.title: Live bravely in the time you have and smile at the void.

summary: The absolute highlight of this HP fic (aside from the whole thing? Honestly, it's just been a blast and a half writing this...
body:
The absolute highlight of this HP fic (aside from the whole thing? Honestly, it’s just been a blast and a half writing this thing, and that’s saying something because by this point I’m usually attempting to hire an assassin to kill my WIP for me), a part that just has me a bit too proud of myself for my own good?

Sorting Hat vs a student’s magical hijab, because enchanted headwear just be like that, man.

This hijab has somehow become one of my favorite characters, but it’s not really a character, you know? It has personality, definitely. It was a gift to the student by her parents, who just want to make sure she’s safe. It can fight (beware yee who touch this hijab with malicious intent), but it can’t talk (unfortunately). Despite that, it developed a personality. Don’t ask me how. Call it Carpet From Aladdin Syndrome, idfk. I love it, and the student that wears it is none-too-shabby, either. She super cool.

I am having way too much creative free-reign fun with this fic. I should have written Harry Potter fic forever ago!

blog.name: kozprojects
blog.title: Klub Obrońców Ziemi
blog.description: Just a crew of friends recording podfics. (Our name translates from Polish to the Earth Defenders' Club. Yeah, we're that humble ;) Also, it may or may not be inspired by a certain infamous anime).

summary: Po dłuuugich bojach, nasza kolejna podfikowa produkcja. Z tak dużą obsadą jeszcze nie pracowałyśmy!  --- Hermiona i Luna jakiś...
caption:
Po dłuuugich bojach, nasza kolejna podfikowa produkcja. Z tak dużą obsadą jeszcze nie pracowałyśmy!

—

Hermiona i Luna jakiś czas po ukończeniu Hogwartu* trafiają do Lindean, szkockiego miasteczka na skraju bardzo szczególnego lasu. A każde miasteczko ma swojego wariata…

—

Fandom: Harry Potter

Tekst: Arianrod (http://forum.mirriel.net/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=4381)

Nagranie: Klub Obrońców Ziemi i (liczni) przyjaciele (kozprojects@gmail.com). Wersja do ściągnięcia: http://bit.ly/2J17Jxi

Wykonanie “Scarborough Fair” na fletni pana wykorzystane w tle - Stephan Elan https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-wzQz…


*Tekst zdecydowanie nie jest zgodny z epilogiem HP, powstał przed publikacją ostatniego tomu serii.

summary: If You Read Fanfiction on A03 Read This ASAP
title: If You Read Fanfiction on A03 Read This ASAP
body:
y’all get yourselves an a03 account cause there are fics that you cannot read unless you have an account and there is some good shit™ 

plus it keeps all of the fics you’ve read so you can find a fic you read and don’t remember the name of
